channel.title: admin on Valentin Bruder
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Valentin Bruder

item.description: I’m a doctoral researcher at the University of Stuttgart Visualization Research Center (VISUS) and part of the collaborative research center SFB-TRR 161 on quantitative methods for visual computing. I develop new methods to assess, model, and predict performance of visual computing systems. Thereby, I focus on applications from the domain of scientific visualization.
